aria-label="Flip card"></button></div></li></ul></section><section class="_9qq9r0 jaw9k70  jaw9k71 section"><h2 class="_1o81se70">Frequently Asked Questions</h2><div class="irvfeg0 accordion"><button class="_1libefw0 k6iab9b" aria-controls="e5b9402-4131-48d7-a796-c43178dbb2b8" aria-expanded="false" type="button"><span>What is Disney+ and how much does it cost? </span></button><div role="region" class="irvfeg1 irvfeg3" id="e5b9402-4131-48d7-a796-c43178dbb2b8" aria-labelledby="e5b9402-4131-48d7-a796-c43178dbb2b8" aria-hidden="true"><div class="naqz0b2p k6iab91"><p><span class="k6iab93">Disney+ is a streaming service where you can watch movies, series, and originals from Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, National Geographic, and more.</span><br/><span class="k6iab93">Access unlimited entertainment with Disney+ Basic or Disney+ Premium in the United States:</span></p><ul><li><p><span class="k6iab93"> </span><a href="/identity/sign-up?pref=disney_basic" rel="noreferrer" class=" e26hr50 k6iab93" data-testid="standalone_ads_cta">Disney+ Basic: Disney+ (With Ads)</a><span class="k6iab93"> for the price of $9.99/month</span></p></li></ul><ul><li><p><span class="k6iab93"> </span><a href="/identity/sign-up?pref=disney_premium" rel="noreferrer" class=" e26hr50 k6iab93" data-testid="standalone_cta_monthly">Disney+ Premium: Disney+ (No Ads*)</a><span class="k6iab93"> for the price of $15.99/month or $159.99/year</span></p></li></ul><p><span class="k6iab93">Save over 16%** on </span><a href="/identity/sign-up?pref=disney_premium&amp;duration=annual" rel="noreferrer" class=" e26hr50 k6iab93" data-testid="standalone_cta_annual">Disney+ Premium (No Ads)</a><span class="k6iab93"> with an annual plan for $159.99/year</span><br/></p><p><span class="k6iab91">*Ads will be served in select live and linear content.  </span><br/><span class="k6iab91">**Savings compared to 12 months of the monthly price of Disney+ Premium (No Ads).</span></p></div></div></div><div class="irvfeg0 accordion"><button class="_1libefw0 k6iab9b" aria-controls="b4845562-9560-4720-a448-55e0e87637fa" aria-expanded="false" type="button"><span>What can I watch on Disney+ and where can I watch Disney+? </span></button><div role="region" class="irvfeg1 irvfeg3" id="b4845562-9560-4720-a448-55e0e87637fa" aria-labelledby="b4845562-9560-4720-a448-55e0e87637fa" aria-hidden="true"><p><span class="k6iab93">Disney+ is the streaming home for entertainment from Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, National Geographic, Hulu, ESPN+ and more. With Disney+, you can choose from an always-growing collection of stories.</span></p><ul><li><p><span class="k6iab93">New releases and timeless classics</span></p></li><li><p><span class="k6iab93">Exclusive new Original Movies and Series</span></p></li><li><p><span class="k6iab93">A limited selection of hit Hulu series and movies in the Hulu hub on Disney+.</span></p></li><li><p><span class="k6iab93">Select live sports, studio shows, and more from ESPN+ in the all-new ESPN hub in Disney+</span></p></li><li><p><span class="k6iab93">Exciting specials and limited-time streaming events</span></p></li><li><p><span class="k6iab93">Nostalgic throwbacks and past seasons of your favorite shows</span></p></li><li><p><span class="k6iab93">The entire Skywalker Saga and much of the Marvel Cinematic Universe</span></p></li><li><p><span class="k6iab93">Beloved and experimental shorts</span></p></li><li><p><span class="k6iab93">Documentaries, unscripted series, and so much more</span></p></li></ul><p><span class="k6iab93">The Disney+ app is available on mobile devices, web browsers, game consoles, set-top boxes, and smart TVs. Click to view a complete </span><a href="https://help.disneyplus.com/article/disneyplus-devices-supported/?utm_source=disneyplus&amp;utm_medium=web&amp;utm_campaign=homepage-FAQ-where-can-I-watch&amp;utm_content=supported-devices" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer" class=" e26hr50 k6iab93" data-testid="mlp_link">list of supported devices</a><span class="k6iab93">.</span></p></div></div><div class="irvfeg0 accordion"><button class="_1libefw0 k6iab9b" aria-controls="ace4581f-71c6-42c8-8758-71ff49104b94" aria-expanded="false" type="button"><span>What are the different bundle plans available and how much do they cost? What additional plan offerings can I choose from? </span></button><div role="region" class="irvfeg1 irvfeg3" id="ace4581f-71c6-42c8-8758-71ff49104b94" aria-labelledby="ace4581f-71c6-42c8-8758-71ff49104b94" aria-hidden="true"><div class="naqz0b2p k6iab91"><p><span class="k6iab93">Bundle plans include subscriptions to either Disney+ and Hulu, or Disney+, Hulu, and ESPN+, at discounted prices, as compared to the retail price of each subscription when purchased separately. Available to customers in the United States.</span></p><p><span class="k6iab93">Choose between the following bundle plans:</span></p><br/><ul><li><p><span class="k6iab93">Disney+, Hulu Bundle Basic for $10.99/month, which includes Disney+ (With Ads) and Hulu (With Ads)</span></p></li><li><p><span class="k6iab93">Disney+, Hulu Bundle Premium for $19.99/month, which includes Disney+ (No Ads*) and Hulu (No Ads*)</span></p></li><li><p><span class="k6iab93">Disney+, Hulu, ESPN+ Bundle Basic for $16.99/month, which includes Disney+ (With Ads), Hulu (With Ads), and ESPN+ (With Ads) </span></p></li><li><p><span class="k6iab93">Disney+, Hulu, ESPN+ Bundle Premium for $26.99/month, which includes Disney+ (No Ads*), Hulu (No Ads*), and ESPN+ (With Ads) </span></p></li></ul><br/><p><span class="k6iab93">Additionally, you may also like the following plan offerings: </span></p><p><span class="k6iab93">1. Hulu + Live TV plans </span></p><ul><li><p><span class="k6iab93">Hulu (With Ads) + Live TV, Disney+ (With Ads) and ESPN+ (With Ads) for $82.99/month</span></p></li></ul><ul><li><p><span class="k6iab93">Hulu (No Ads*) + Live TV, Disney+ (No Ads*) and ESPN+ (With Ads) for $95.99/month</span></p></li></ul><p><span class="k6iab93">The Hulu + Live TV plans include 95+ live TV channels and additional on-demand content from your favorite sports, entertainment, and news channels you can watch at home or on-the-go. You will also get access to the content from Disney+, Hulu and ESPN+ streaming libraries. Access content from each service separately. Learn more and sign up </span><a href="https://www.hulu.com/live-tv" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer" class="k6iab93" data-testid="mlp_link">here</a><span class="k6iab93">. </span></p><p><span class="k6iab93">2. Disney+, Hulu, HBO Max Bundle </span></p><p><span class="k6iab93">Disney+, Hulu, HBO Max Bundle plans include subscriptions to Disney+, Hulu, and HBO Max, at discounted prices, as compared to the monthly retail price of each subscription when purchased separately. Currently, there is no annual subscription for the Disney+, Hulu, HBO Max Bundle.</span></p><p><span class="k6iab93">Choose between the following Disney+, Hulu, HBO Max Bundle Plans:</span></p><ul><li><p><span class="k6iab93">Disney+, Hulu, HBO Max Bundle (With Ads) for $16.99/month, savings of more than $12 per month. This plan includes Disney+, Hulu, and HBO Max all with ads.</span></p></li></ul><ul><li><p><span class="k6iab93">Disney+, Hulu, HBO Max Bundle (No Ads) for $29.99/month, savings of $21 per month. This plan includes Disney+, Hulu, and HBO Max all without ads. Ads will be served in select live and linear content.</span><br/></p></li></ul><p><span class="k6iab93">With Disney+, you get new releases, classics, series, and Originals from Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, and National Geographic.</span></p><p><span class="k6iab93">With Hulu, you can enjoy current hits, comfort classics, award-winning Originals, and movies like FXâ€™s </span><i><span class="k6iab93">The Bear</span></i><span class="k6iab93"> and </span><i><span class="k6iab93">The Kardashians</span></i><span class="k6iab93">.</span></p><p><span class="k6iab93">With HBO Max, you get access to HBO Originals, Warner Bros. films, the DC universe, and more like </span><i><span class="k6iab93">Selena + Chef</span></i><span class="k6iab93"> and </span><i><span class="k6iab93">House of the Dragon</span></i><span class="k6iab93">.</span><br/><br/><i><span class="k6iab91">*Ads will be served in select live and linear content</span></i></p></div></div></div><div class="irvfeg0 accordion"><button class="_1libefw0 k6iab9b" aria-controls="f965b-7877-4cc6-8a11-19f0ed418d77" aria-expanded="false" type="button"><span>How and where can I access Hulu titles on Disney+?</span></button><div role="region" class="irvfeg1 irvfeg3" id="f965b-7877-4cc6-8a11-19f0ed418d77" aria-labelledby="f965b-7877-4cc6-8a11-19f0ed418d77" aria-hidden="true"><p><span class="k6iab93">If youâ€™re a Disney+ subscriber in the United States, you can stream a limited selection of Hulu titles on Disney+. Access the Hulu hub on the Disney+ homepage to preview the Hulu on Disney+ experience.</span></p><p><span class="k6iab93">If youâ€™re a bundle subscriber or you subscribe to both Disney+ and Hulu (as standalone services with the same email address), you can stream a more extensive collection of Hulu titles on Disney+. You can use the Hulu hub on the Disney+ homepage to jump right into streaming some of your favorite Hulu Originals, series, and more. Click to view a </span><a href="https://help.disneyplus.com/article/disneyplus-devices-supported/?utm_source=disneyplus&amp;utm_medium=web&amp;utm_campaign=homepage-FAQ-where-can-I-watch&amp;utm_content=supported-devices" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer" class=" e26hr50 k6iab93" data-testid="mlp_link">list of supported devices</a><span class="k6iab93">.</span></p><p><span class="k6iab93">Eligible Disney+ and Hulu subscribers can watch a wide variety of Huluâ€™s streaming library on Disney+. Certain Hulu titles are available only via the Hulu app. In addition, the Hulu app will continue to be the streaming destination for Huluâ€™s entire streaming library, all Hulu premium add-on content as well as any content associated with a Live TV subscription.</span></p></div></div><div class="irvfeg0 accordion"><button class="_1libefw0 k6iab9b" aria-controls="f6ea7573-adf2-4b2c-8512-3a25c394eda5" aria-expanded="false" type="button"><span>What are Streams on Disney+?</span></button><div role="region" class="irvfeg1 irvfeg3" id="f6ea7573-adf2-4b2c-8512-3a25c394eda5" aria-labelledby="f6ea7573-adf2-4b2c-8512-3a25c394eda5" aria-hidden="true"><p><span class="k6iab93">Streams is a new feature that carefully curates content from within the Disney+ app or provides access to live linear streams, such as ABC News, to give you a continuous streaming experience. This feature is available for all Disney+ and bundle subscribers. Learn more about what content you can watch with </span><a href="https://help.disneyplus.com/article/disneyplus-streams/?utm_source=disneyplus&amp;utm_medium=web&amp;utm_campaign=homepage-FAQ&amp;utm_content=streams" rel="noreferrer" class=" e26hr50 k6iab93" data-testid="mlp_link">Streams</a><span class="k6iab93"> at the Disney+ Help Center.</span></p></div></div><div class="irvfeg0 accordion"><button class="_1libefw0 k6iab9b" aria-controls="cb5f62fc-5c1c-40a8-8575-e4cfa13a63f6" aria-expanded="false" type="button"><span>How and where can I access ESPN+ titles on Disney+?</span></button><div role="region" class="irvfeg1 irvfeg3" id="cb5f62fc-5c1c-40a8-8575-e4cfa13a63f6" aria-labelledby="cb5f62fc-5c1c-40a8-8575-e4cfa13a63f6" aria-hidden="true"><div class="naqz0b2p k6iab91"><p><span class="k6iab93">You can now view a selection of ESPN+ live sports, studio shows, and more in the all-new ESPN hub of your Disney+ app. </span></p><p><span class="k6iab93">Available to all Disney+ and Bundle subscribers, ESPN on Disney+ has something for everyone, depending on your subscription:</span></p><ul><li><p><span class="k6iab93">If you have an ESPN+ subscription (either as part of a bundle that includes ESPN+ or a standalone ESPN+ subscription in addition to your Disney+ subscription), youâ€™ll access all of ESPN+ â€“ including thousands of live sports from top leagues including the NFL, NHL, UFC, PGA TOUR, LALIGA, and college sports, and ESPN Original films and the full 30 for 30 library â€“  directly in Disney+. Does not include Pay-Per-View events or other add-ons, which you must purchase and watch directly in the ESPN app.</span></p></li><li><p><span class="k6iab93">If you donâ€™t have an ESPN+ subscription, you will still receive a curated selection of ESPN+ content for no additional cost.  Stream a curated selection of ESPN+ live events from top leagues including the NHL, and ESPN Originals and studio shows, right on Disney+. </span><a href="https://help.disneyplus.com/article/disneyplus-watch-espn-plus/?utm_source=disneyplus&amp;utm_medium=web&amp;utm_campaign=disneyplus-mlp-FAQ-espnplus-titles&amp;utm_content=disneyplus-watch-espn-plus" rel="noreferrer" class="k6iab93" data-testid="mlp_link">Learn more</a><span class="k6iab93">.</span></p></li></ul><p><span class="k6iab93">Find your ESPN+ titles in your Disney+ homepage, in the ESPN hub, and through Search.</span></p><p><span class="k6iab93">ESPN+ content includes many sports programs that do not have ratings, including live events, news, and more. These programs may include content and advertising* that may feature mature themes, products, and services, like you would typically see on a regular television broadcast.</span></p><ul><li><p><span class="k6iab93">These programs will be available to all profiles on your Disney+ account (except for Junior Mode profiles). You can control access to these programs for each profile using our parental control settings. </span><a href="https://help.disneyplus.com/article/disneyplus-parental-controls/?utm_source=disneyplus&amp;utm_medium=web&amp;utm_campaign=ESPN-mlp&amp;utm_content=parental-controls" rel="noreferrer" class="k6iab93" data-testid="mlp_link">Learn more</a><span class="k6iab93">.</span></p></li><li><p><span class="k6iab93">Programs and titles outside these categories (for example, programs with content ratings and certain on-demand titles without content ratings) will continue to adhere to the content ratings and maturity settings of each profile.</span></p></li></ul><p><span class="k6iab91"> *Ads will be served in select live and linear content for all Disney+ plans. Titles without ratings like live sports, news, and more, and the advertisements included therein, may feature mature themes, products, and services.</span></p></div></div></div></section></main><footer class="zc8ony0 multi-column-footer dcwn120" data-testid="disneyplus-footer"><div class="zc8ony1"><section class="_4m2d9p0 _4onr3m0"><div
